equations

Class EquationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • equations.EquationManager

  • public class EquationManager
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EquationManager(int order)
      Creates a new equation manager, which holds equations to count orbits of the given order.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EquationManager

        public EquationManager(int order)
        Creates a new equation manager, which holds equations to count orbits of the given order.
        Parameters:
        order - The order of the orbits to be counted with the equations in this equation manager.

    • Method Detail

      • addEquation

        public void addEquation(Equation e)
        Tries to add an equation to the manager. If there is no equation present with the same lowest-number orbit in the left-hand side, the equation will be added to the manager. If there is an equation with identical graphlets in the left-hand side, the new equation will be merged with it. If neither applies, the equation will not be added.
        Parameters:
        e -

      • getEqu

        public Equation[] getEqu()
        Returns an array containing the equations in this equation manager.
        Returns:
        An array containing this equation manager's equations.

      • getRhsOrbits

        public java.util.Set<OrbitRepresentative> getRhsOrbits()
        Returns a set containing all orbits over which a sum is made in the right-hand side of any equation.
        Returns:
        A set containing all orbits over which a sum is made in the right-hand side of any equation.
